name: @plantinformatics/vcf-genotype-brapi
description: Client and server functions to access genotype data from VCF via a custom web API and BrAPI

scripts.prepare.old: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n vcf-genotype-brapi -o dist/vcf-genotype-brapi.js  -e interval-tree-1d,@solgenomics/brapijs -- main.js
scripts.prepare: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs

author: AgriBio / Don Isdale
